subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] May this not be kicking a dead horse...
msgSnippet: ... I did some preliminary work on it. WG2 begins tomorrow, so it is too late to get anything done on it now; the next meeting is in October. Michael Everson *
messageBody:
On 17 Apr 2010, at 21:32, tim_rice09 wrote:

> Wow it's been a long time since I've been here.
> I was searching the message logs and noticed that the last mention of getting QS into the official Unicode body was quite a while ago. I looked at the proposed chart available in the files section for this group and finally see how well adding QS into the Shavian codespace can work. Has anyone else thought any more about this?

I did some preliminary work on it. WG2 begins tomorrow, so it is too late to get anything done on it now; the next meeting is in October.

Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
